description: This file defines the class 'RoundedRectDrawable', a custom drawable for rendering rounded rectangles with optional subtle shadow effects. It is used for drawing modern rounded cards/buttons in an Android app, parameterized by fill color and corner radius.

classes.name: RoundedRectDrawable
classes.description: A custom drawable that renders a rounded rectangle with optional shadow, customizable by fill color and corner radius.

methods.name: draw
methods.description: Draws the rounded rectangle onto the provided canvas.

methods.name: setAlpha
methods.description: Sets the transparency level for the drawable.

methods.name: setColorFilter
methods.description: Applies a color filter to the drawable.

methods.name: getOpacity
methods.description: Returns the opacity/translucency configuration of the drawable.
